verses.verse: Hannah<WH2584> prayed,<WH6419> and said:<WH559> "My heart<WH3820> exults<WH5970> in Yahweh!<WH3068> My horn<WH7161> is exalted<WH7311> in Yahweh.<WH3068> My mouth<WH6310> is enlarged<WH7337> over my enemies,<WH341> because I rejoice<WH8055> in your salvation.<WH3444>
There is no one as holy<WH6918> as Yahweh,<WH3068> For there is no one besides<WH1115> you,<WH6697> nor is there any rock like our God.<WH430>

"Talk<WH1696> no more<WH7235> so exceeding<WH1364> proudly.<WH1364> Don't<WH6277> let arrogance come<WH3318> out of your mouth,<WH6310> For Yahweh<WH3068> is a God<WH410> of knowledge.<WH1844> By him actions<WH5949> are weighed.<WH8505>
"The bows<WH7198> of the mighty men<WH1368> are broken.<WH2844> Those who stumbled<WH3782> are armed<WH247> with strength.<WH2428>

Those who were full<WH7649> have hired themselves out<WH7936> for bread.<WH3899> Those who were hungry<WH7457> are satisfied.<WH2308> Yes,<WH6135> the barren has borne<WH3205> seven.<WH7651> She who has many<WH7227> children<WH1121> languishes.<WH535>
"Yahweh<WH3068> kills,<WH4191> and makes alive.<WH2421> He brings down<WH3381> to Sheol,<WH7585> and brings up.<WH5927>
Yahweh<WH3068> makes poor,<WH3423> and makes rich.<WH6238> He brings low,<WH8213> he also<WH637> lifts up.<WH7311>

He raises up<WH6965> the poor<WH1800> out of the dust.<WH6083> He lifts up<WH7311> the needy<WH34> from the dunghill,<WH830> To make them sit<WH3427> with princes,<WH5081> and inherit<WH5157> the throne<WH3678> of glory.<WH3519> For the pillars<WH4690> of the earth<WH776> are Yahweh<WH3068>'s. He has set<WH7896> the world on them.<WH8398>

He will keep<WH8104> the feet<WH7272> of his holy ones,<WH2623> but the wicked<WH7563> shall be put to silence<WH1826> in darkness;<WH2822> for no man<WH376> shall prevail<WH1396> by strength.<WH3581>

Those who strive<WH7378> with Yahweh<WH3068> shall be broken to pieces.<WH2865> He will thunder<WH7481> against them in the sky.<WH8064> "Yahweh<WH3068> will judge<WH1777> the ends<WH657> of the earth.<WH776> He will give<WH5414> strength<WH5797> to his king,<WH4428> and exalt<WH7311> the horn<WH7161> of his anointed.<WH4899>"
Elkanah<WH511> went<WH3212> to Ramah<WH7414> to his house.<WH1004> The child<WH5288> <WH1961> served<WH8334> Yahweh<WH3068> before<WH6440> Eli<WH5941> the priest.<WH3548>
Now the sons<WH1121> of Eli<WH5941> were base<WH1100> men;<WH1121> they didn't<WH3045> know Yahweh.<WH3068>

The custom<WH4941> of the priests<WH3548> with the people<WH5971> was that when any man<WH376> offered<WH2076> sacrifice,<WH2077> the priest<WH3548>'s servant<WH5288> came,<WH935> while the flesh<WH1320> was boiling,<WH1310> with a fork<WH4207> of three<WH7969> teeth<WH8127> in his hand;<WH3027>

and he struck<WH5221> it into the pan,<WH3595> or kettle,<WH1731> or caldron,<WH7037> or pot;<WH6517> all that the fork<WH4207> brought up<WH5927> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> therewith.<WH6213> So they did in Shiloh<WH7887> to all the Israelites<WH3478> who came there.<WH935>

Yes,<WH6999> before they burnt the fat,<WH2459> the priest<WH3548>'s servant<WH5288> came,<WH935> and said<WH559> to the man<WH376> who sacrificed,<WH2076> "Give<WH5414> meat<WH1320> to roast<WH6740> for the priest;<WH3548> for he will not accept<WH3947> boiled<WH1310> meat<WH1320> from you,<WH2416> but raw."

If the man<WH376> said<WH559> to him,<WH6999> "Let the fat<WH2459> be burned<WH6999> first,<WH3117> and then take<WH3947> as much as your soul<WH5315> desires;<WH183>" then he would say,<WH559> "No,<WH5414> but you shall give it to me now;<WH3947> and if not, I will take it by force.<WH2394>"
The sin<WH2403> of the young men<WH5288> was very<WH3966> great<WH1419> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> for the men<WH582> despised<WH5006> the offering<WH4503> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
But Samuel<WH8050> ministered<WH8334> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> being a child,<WH5288> clothed<WH2296> with a linen<WH906> ephod.<WH646>

Moreover his mother<WH517> made<WH6213> him a little<WH6996> robe,<WH4598> and brought<WH5927> it to him from year<WH3117> to year,<WH3117> when she came up<WH5927> with her husband<WH376> to offer<WH2076> the yearly<WH3117> sacrifice.<WH2077>

Eli<WH5941> blessed<WH1288> Elkanah<WH511> and his wife,<WH802> and said,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> give<WH7760> you seed<WH2233> of this woman<WH802> for the petition<WH7596> which was asked<WH7592> of Yahweh.<WH3068>" They went<WH1980> to their own home.<WH4725>

Yahweh<WH3068> visited<WH6485> Hannah,<WH2584> and<WH3588> she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> and two<WH8147> daughters.<WH1323> The child<WH5288> Samuel<WH8050> grew<WH1431> before<WH5973> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Now Eli<WH5941> was very<WH3966> old;<WH2204> and he heard<WH8085> all that his sons<WH1121> did<WH6213> to all Israel,<WH3478> and how that they lay<WH7901> with the women<WH802> who served<WH6633> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
He said<WH559> to them,<WH6213> "Why do you do such things?<WH1697> for I hear<WH8085> of your evil<WH7451> dealings<WH1697> from all this people.<WH5971>
No,<WH1121> my sons; for it is no good<WH2896> report<WH8052> that I hear:<WH8085> you make Yahweh<WH3068>'s people<WH5971> disobey.<WH5674>

If one man<WH376> sin<WH2398> against another,<WH376> God<WH430> shall judge<WH6419> him;<WH376> but if a man sin<WH2398> against Yahweh,<WH3068> who shall entreat<WH6419> for him?<WH8085>" Notwithstanding, they didn't listen to the voice<WH6963> of their father,<WH1> because Yahweh<WH3068> intended<WH2654> to kill them.<WH4191>
The child<WH5288> Samuel<WH8050> grew<WH1432> on,<WH1980> and increased in favor<WH2896> both with Yahweh,<WH3068> and also with men.<WH582>

A man<WH376> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to Eli,<WH5941> and said<WH559> to him,<WH559> "Thus says Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH1540> 'Did I reveal myself<WH1540> to the house<WH1004> of your father,<WH1> when they were in Egypt<WH4714> in bondage to Pharaoh<WH6547>'s house?<WH1004>

Did I choose<WH977> him out of all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> to be my priest,<WH3548> to go<WH5927> up to my altar,<WH4196> to burn<WH6999> incense,<WH7004> to wear<WH5375> an ephod<WH646> before<WH6440> me?<WH5414> Did I give to the house<WH1004> of your father<WH1> all the offerings of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> made by fire?<WH801>

Why do you kick<WH1163> at my sacrifice<WH2077> and at my offering,<WH2077> which I have commanded<WH6680> in my habitation,<WH4583> and honor<WH3513> your sons<WH1121> above me,<WH1254> to make yourselves fat with the best<WH7225> of all the offerings<WH4503> of Israel<WH3478> my people?<WH5971>'

"Therefore Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> says,<WH5002> <WH5002> 'I said indeed<WH559> that your house,<WH1004> and the house<WH1004> of your father,<WH1> should walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> me<WH5704> forever.<WH5769>' But now Yahweh<WH3068> says,<WH5002> <WH2486> 'Be it far from me; for those who honor<WH3513> me I will honor,<WH3513> and those who despise<WH959> me shall be lightly esteemed.<WH7043>

Behold,<WH3117> the days come,<WH935> that I will cut off<WH1438> your arm,<WH2220> and the arm<WH2220> of your father<WH1>'s house,<WH1004> that there shall not be an old man<WH2205> in your house.<WH1004>

You shall see<WH5027> the affliction<WH6862> of my habitation,<WH4583> in all the wealth which I shall give<WH3190> Israel;<WH3478> and there shall not be an old man<WH2205> in your house<WH1004> forever.<WH3117>

The man<WH376> of yours,<WH3772> whom I shall not cut off from my altar,<WH4196> shall consume<WH3615> your eyes,<WH5869> and grieve<WH109> your heart;<WH5315> and all the increase<WH4768> of your house<WH1004> shall die<WH4191> in the flower of their age.<WH582>
<WH226>"'This shall be the sign to you,<WH935> that shall come on your two<WH8147> sons,<WH1121> on Hophni<WH2652> and Phinehas:<WH6372> in one<WH259> day<WH3117> they shall both<WH8147> die.<WH4191>

I will raise me up<WH6965> a faithful<WH539> priest,<WH3548> that shall do<WH6213> according to that which is in my heart<WH3824> and in my mind.<WH5315> I will build<WH1129> him a sure<WH539> house;<WH1004> and he shall walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> my anointed<WH4899> forever.<WH3117>

It shall happen,<WH3498> that everyone who is left in your house<WH1004> shall come<WH935> and bow down<WH7812> to him for a piece<WH95> of silver<WH3701> and a loaf<WH3603> of bread,<WH3899> and shall say,<WH559> "Please put<WH5596> me into one<WH259> of the priests<WH3550>' offices, that I may eat<WH398> a morsel<WH6595> of bread.<WH3899>"'"
